data.name: About
data.value: About Flagrum

data.name: AboutSubtext
data.value: Flagrum is an all-in-one modding suite for Final Fantasy XV.

data.name: Streamline
data.value: Improve upon and streamline the existing modding process

data.name: Accessible
data.value: Make modding FFXV more accessible and less time consuming

data.name: Fix
data.value: Fix glaring issues with the previous mod tooling

data.name: Foundation
data.value: Build a quality foundation and set a precedent for the ongoing development of modding tools

data.name: Continue
data.value: Continue to add new tools and further what modding is possible

data.name: Join
data.value: Join the Cause

data.name: Roadmap
data.value: Roadmap

data.name: RoadmapSubtext
data.value: Following are the long term plans for the mod tooling:

data.name: Goals
data.value: The goals with Flagrum are as follows:

data.name: Updates
data.value: Continuous updates and maintenance to Flagrum

data.name: NodeEditor
data.value: Creation of a Visual Scripting tool for EXML

data.name: LevelEditor
data.value: Creation of a Final Fantasy XV Level Editor

data.name: Further
data.value: Further support for all manner of other possibilities

data.name: Support
data.value: Support the Continued Development of FFXV Mod Tools

data.name: SupportSubtext
data.value: These tools take a monumental amount of time and effort to develop. If you want to help support the ongoing development of Flagrum and my other modding projects, please consider donating.
